name: wizard-math
description: Model focused on math and logic problems
readmeHtml:
Now updated to WizardMath 7B v1.1: ollama pull wizard-math. This new version is trained from Mistral-7B and achieves even higher benchmark scores than previous versions.

WizardMath was released by WizardLM. It is trained on the GSM8k dataset, and targeted at math questions. It is available in 7B, 13B, and 70B parameter sizes.

Example prompt

How many 4-digit numbers have the last digit equal to the sum of the first two digits?

References

HuggingFace
readmeMarkdown:
![](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/633681/263121166-8b16834a-1da2-4a68-8aac-13d19775e7d7.png)

> Now updated to WizardMath 7B v1.1: `ollama pull wizard-math`. This new version is trained from Mistral-7B and achieves even higher benchmark scores than previous versions.

WizardMath was released by WizardLM. It is trained on the GSM8k dataset, and targeted at math questions. It is available in 7B, 13B, and 70B parameter sizes.

## Example prompt

```
How many 4-digit numbers have the last digit equal to the sum of the first two digits?
```

**References**

[HuggingFace](https://huggingface.co/WizardLM/WizardMath-7B-V1.0)
